me.kevingleason.pnwebrtc

Class PnRTCClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.kevingleason.pnwebrtc.PnRTCClient

  • public class PnRTCClient
extends java.lang.Object

    Main WebRTC Signaling class, holds all functions to set up PeerConnection

     Author:  Kevin Gleason - Boston College '16
 File:    PnRTCClient.java
 Date:    7/20/15
 Use:     PubNub WebRTC Signaling
 © 2009 - 2015 PubNub, Inc.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PnRTCClient

        public PnRTCClient(java.lang.String pubKey,
                   java.lang.String subKey)
        Minimal constructor. Requires a valid Pub and Sub key. Get your Pub/Sub keys for free at https://admin.pubnub.com/#/register and find keys on developer portal. No UUID provided so a random phone number will be generated with this constructor (XXX-XXXX).
        Parameters:
        pubKey - PubNub Pub Key
        subKey - PubNub Sub Key

      • PnRTCClient

        public PnRTCClient(java.lang.String pubKey,
                   java.lang.String subKey,
                   java.lang.String UUID)
        Slightly more verbose constructor. Requires a valid Pub and Sub key. Get your Pub/Sub keys for free at https://admin.pubnub.com/#/register and find keys on developer portal.
        Parameters:
        pubKey - PubNub Pub Key
        subKey - PubNub Sub Key
        UUID - Any UUID to be used as a username

    • Method Detail

        Return the PnRTCClient peer connection constraints.
        Returns:
        Peer Connection Constrains

      • getPubNub

        public com.pubnub.api.Pubnub getPubNub()
        Return the PnRTCClient Pubnub instance.
        Returns:
        The PnRTCClient's Pubnub instance

      • getUUID

        public java.lang.String getUUID()
        Return the UUID (username) of the PnRTCClient. If not provided by the constructor, a random phone number is generated and can be retrieived with this method
        Returns:
        The UUID username of the client

      • setSignalParams

        public void setSignalParams(PnSignalingParams signalParams)
        Set the signaling parameters. This includes MediaConstraints for PeerConnection, Video, and Audio, as well as a list of possible PeerConnection.IceServer candidates.
        Parameters:
        signalParams - Parameters for WebRTC Signaling

      • attachLocalMediaStream

        public void attachLocalMediaStream(org.webrtc.MediaStream mediaStream)
        Need to attach mediaStream before you can connect.
        Parameters:
        mediaStream - Not null local media stream

      • attachRTCListener

        public void attachRTCListener(PnRTCListener listener)
        Attach custom listener for callbacks!
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener which extends PnRTCListener to implement callbacks

      • setMaxConnections

        public void setMaxConnections(int max)
        Set the maximum simultaneous connections allowed
        Parameters:
        max - Max simultaneous connections

      • listenOn

        public void listenOn(java.lang.String channel)
        Subscribe to a channel using PubNub to listen for calls.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel to listen on, your "phone number"

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String userId)
        Connect with another user by their ID.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user to establish a WebRTC connection with

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection(java.lang.String userId)
        Close a single peer connection. Send a PubNub hangup signal as well
        Parameters:
        userId - User to close a connection with

      • closeAllConnections

        public void closeAllConnections()
        Close all peer connections. Send a PubNub hangup signal as well.

      • transmit

        public void transmit(java.lang.String userId,
                     JSONObject message)
        Send a custom JSONObject user message to a single peer.
        Parameters:
        userId - user to send a message to
        message - the JSON message to pass to a peer.

      • transmitAll

        public void transmitAll(JSONObject message)
        Send a custom JSONObject user message to all peers.
        Parameters:
        message - the JSON message to pass to all peers.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Call this method in Activity.onDestroy() to clost all open connections and clean up instance for garbage collection.
